citations.narrative:
Two white Bengal tigers from Kaufman, TX were exhibited at Critter Lane Petting Zoo, Valles Mines, MO.
Licenses are issued to specific persons, and are issued for specific activities, types and numbers of animals, and
approved sites. The Kaufman, TX location has not been inspected and therefore is not an approved site.
The licensee must wait for the site in Kaufman, TX to be approved prior to conducting regulated activity from that site.
Correct upon receipt of the inspection report
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
End Section

narrative:
2.1(b)(1) 
   
Requirements and application 
Two white Bengal tigers from Kaufman, TX were exhibited at Critter Lane Petting Zoo, Valles Mines, MO. 
Licenses are issued to specific persons, and are issued for specific activities, types and numbers of animals, and 
approved sites. The Kaufman, TX location has not been inspected and therefore is not an approved site. 
The licensee must wait for the site in Kaufman, TX to be approved prior to conducting regulated activity from that site. 
Correct upon receipt of the inspection report 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
End Section
